alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rock, eastern Brown, western Holt, southeastern Keya Paha and southwestern Boyd Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Springview to 7 miles west of Rose. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bassett, Springview, Atkinson, Stuart, Long Pine, Newport, Rose, Amelia, Dustin, Sybrant, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Keller Park State Recreation Area, Thomas Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Duff, Mariaville, Pony Lake, Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge, Jones Lake and Johnsons Corner. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 151 and 213. Highway 20 between mile markers 245 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
